text: Yesterday West German Defence Minister, Herr Strauss, started talks with the British Defence Minister, Mr. Watkinson. Their talks are another stage in the cloak operation, 1961 variety, by which the West German militarists are advancing their rearmament. Herr Strauss told the Daily Mail last October that his policy was to make ally.
handwritten_text: Yesterday West German Defence Minister, Herr Strauss, started talks with the British Defence Minister, Mr. Watkinson. Their talks are another stage in the cloak operation, 1961 variety, by which the West German militarists are advancing their rearmament. Herr Strauss told the Daily Mail last October that his policy was to make ally.
